page.title: 02Bilborough:What people think
page.content: We did a survey on the people who lived in Bilborough,Wollaton and the Strelley area,to find out what they thought of living here.We found most people enjoyed living here.67% of people in the area liked it.28% thought it wasn't bad.Only 12% didn't like it.We also asked them how long they had been living in the area.The years varied from 1 year to 30 years.19% had lived in the area from between 1 and 5 years.The majority of people have lived here for more than 30 years,with a further 19% between 10-15 years.We also asked what changes they would like to see.The majority wanted more recreation grounds,shops and youth clubs.Among some others were leisure centres,toilets and more waste paper bins with street lamps near them.
